EmailTemplate.name: BI Planned Launch Date notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Onboarding__c.Account__c} is live with Foundation Direct BI effective {!Onboarding__c.BI_Launch_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Foundation Accounting,
{!Onboarding__c.Account__c} is live with Foundation Direct BI product effective {!Onboarding__c.BI_Launch_Date__c}
